hadiths.text: Narrated Ya`la:I went out in one of the Ghazwa and a man bit another man and as a result, an incisor tooth of the former was pulled out. The Prophet (ﷺ) cancelled the case

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا عَضَّ رَجُلاً فَوَقَعَتْ ثَنَايَاهُ
chapter.eng-name: If somebody bites a man and has his tooth broken
